title: The 20 best interpretations of seeing Eid in a dream by Ibn Sirin and leading scholars

preview.html: What you do not know about the interpretation of seeing Eid in a dream and its meaningEid in a dream is one of the visions that many interpreters liked and said that it was promising most of the time, knowing that Eid al-Fitr has different meanings from Eid al-Adha and that the age and social status of the fortuneteller have their own brand. From interpretation, with a diverse Egyptian website you will find multiple interpretations of your dreams. So follow the lines below. Eid in a dreamInterpretation of a dream about Eid in a dream shows new acquaintances entering the life of the fortuneteller and they will be good acquaintances and the dream is related to what the dreamer wants from his hopes and aspirations. This vision will serve as a warning to him that success is coming and every goal he pursues will soon be within his reach.Interpretation Eid in a dream, according to what Ibn Shaheen confirmed, means joy and happiness with which the dreamer is satisfied. If a dreamer dreams that he is at a festival, but when he asks about this Eid, he finds that it is unknown and does not belong to the well-known Islamic holidays that everyone knows, then this vision is not good. It has two interpretations. The first interpretation: If the dreamer has great positions and positions and sees this dream, then he should know that his great position will be reduced, and if he is a head of state or an important person among the country’s leaders, he will leave his position and go far away. Thus, the second interpretation: For the dreamer who was living an easy life, this dream assures him that his money will diminish and that his financial level will soon decrease. If the dreamer sees in his dream that he and his family are celebrating the day of Ashura and they are in a state of joy and happiness, then this dream will be interpreted That blessings will be gathered in his house and life will come to them from many doors soon. Al-Nabulsi had different and diverse interpretations, as he said that a young man who rebelled against the worship of God, and was among the disobedient, if he saw that he was on Eid, the interpretation would be positive despite his actions and behavior. He is laden with sins and transgressions, and soon his place will remain among the repentant slaves, and his repentance will be sincere and he will regret what he did. The Compassionate One replaces his bad deeds with his good deeds and confirms him in purity of heart and obedience. When a bound or imprisoned person dreams that he is happy and joyful and performing beautiful Eid rituals, this indicates the end of the days of imprisonment and a return again to freedom and the release of a relative from prison. If the dreamer dreams that he is kneeling in Eid prayer, The interpretation of the dream indicates suppressing his desires and avoiding satisfying them in a distorted way for fear of the relationship and great relationship that exists between him and God. (He is Glory be to Him.) The dreamer who is disobedient and unjust to his parents if he sees this vision, it would be better for him if God made him obey his parents and wake up from the slumber in which he was living because disobedience to parents is a major crime in. Debt, and if he does not repent for it, he will be severely punished and his place will be the fire of this world and the hereafter. If the dreamer prays the Eid prayer in a dream outside of his time or on a day different from the days of Eid, then the interpretation of the vision indicates that the dreamer was deceived and led astray on his way by a group of people around him from He wants it to lead him away from the straight path, and this dream confirms that

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing an open faucet in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing an open faucet in a dream by Ibn Sirin: The great scholar Muhammad Ibn Sirin says that seeing a faucet in a dream is good news of the arrival of sustenance and joy after sadness and misfortunes. Also, seeing a water faucet may indicate the death of worries and sins that the dreamer was overcoming in his dream, as well as happiness and pleasure. Seeing a faucet in a dream indicates the health problems that the viewer faces, as well as the difficulties that the viewer faces. Opening the interpretation of a dream about a faucet for a single woman. If an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is buying a water faucet, this indicates the cessation of her worries, her means of livelihood, and the abundance of money. Also, seeing a money fountain In a dream, it indicates the superiority and brilliant success that the girl will achieve in her dream, in addition to her high status. Also, seeing an open money tap in a dream may indicate the girl’s good circumstances and her close marriage to a good man nearby, and God knows best. Seeing a water tap in a dream could mean That some people benefit from the success of things and also indicates her lasting victory in her life. Interpretation of seeing an open faucet in a dream for a married woman: Seeing buying a water faucet indicates achieving her goals and aspirations that she was striving for in the coming period of her life. A water faucet in a dream brings abundant goodness It is also a sign of a woman’s beauty with abundant morals, and she and her husband will realize the collapse of the differences between them. Interpretation of an open faucet in a dream for a pregnant woman. If a pregnant woman dreams of seeing a faucet, this indicates the disappearance of her worries and anxiety and the ease of her imminent birth, and God knows best. Also, seeing a faucet in a dream may indicate a collapse. The anxiety and distress that the pregnant woman was going through and the facilitation of her affairs and the birth of her child. Interpretation of seeing an open faucet in a dream for a man: If one sees in his dream that he is opening a money faucet, this indicates the removal of worries and transgressions, as well as abundant sustenance and abundance. Also, buying a money faucet for a nice man indicates His closeness to a good, high-status girl, and God knows best. Seeing a faucet in a dream may indicate good character, closeness to God Almighty, faith in God, and repentance from sins and disobedience. Seeing a drone in a dream could indicate goodness and blessings, as well as good health and achieving goals. What is desired by the dreamer, and God knows best. If you have a dream that you want to interpret, put it in a comment below and a team of experts will respond to you as soon as possible.

title: Interpretation of seeing paper in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like itFansSubscribedFansIbn Sirin’s interpretation of seeing paper in a dream indicates many different associations, including praiseworthy revelations, which foretell a positive change that will occur in the dreamer’s life. The papers are white without writing. What is the interpretation of writing on paper? It indicates a living wage and permissibility. What does it mean to see white papers? The excellence of a woman symbolizes good faith and the love and desire of others. What does it mean to see cut papers? It indicates a girl’s failure to achieve the ambitions she wants. What does it mean to see cut papers? Is the interpretation of seeing a torn leaf? It expresses frustration. Eating leaves in a dream indicates a general interest in learning various fields and also indicates that he will be a prominent figure in society. Having a bunch of leaves in a dream symbolizes the great experience he has in his field of work. The vision portends success. , especially if the paper is intact and not torn or dirty. Write on paper in a dream that specifies the dreamer’s source of livelihood and his lawful profits. While seeing a signature in a bachelor’s dream means marriage or obtaining an inheritance. The previous vision also shows that the dreamer has a strong personality. The vision is good for wisdom and thinking. Good for the visionary, which will help him get out of the difficult situation in which he will soon find himself. If the widow sees in a dream that she is holding a blank sheet of paper and writing on it, then the vision shows her strength and solidity in many difficult situations. Signing a harmonious and beautiful handwriting in a dream portends the achievement of Aspirations or promotion at work. Paper in a dream by Ibn SirinWhen a man sees a dreamIf a person receives a blank paper, it means that he receives money. If a paper written on it appears and it is not blank, this indicates the fulfillment of a need. If one sees a banknote in a dream, it is good that You will have a good son of good origin. If he sees a silver leaf missing, the fortuneteller will lose one of his sons. If someone sees a trunk with many banknotes, this indicates abundant livelihood and access to inheritance. Whoever sees five leaves in a dream, these are duties and prayers. The five, so if these cards appear complete, this is evidence that he has fully carried out his duties. Papers written in a dream by a married woman. Seeing a written paper or a car contract signed by a woman in a dream is a sign of the happy events in which she and her family are experiencing. The vision also shows a lot of The livelihood that she will have and will provide her family with all their needs. If a woman sees that she is writing positive words in a dream, this is a sign of an imminent pregnancy. While the display of white papers in a dream symbolizes the woman’s goodwill and love for others and wishes them well. The vision also indicates the wife’s adherence With the teachings of her religion and preserving her chastity, in addition to the happy life she lives with her husband. The vision symbolizes that the woman is raising her children in a healthy way and teaching them their religion correctly and this will be the reason for her high status in society. Writing on papers in a dream indicates that the woman will use a special style

title: Interpretation of murder, whatever its type, its threats in a dream, and its most important meanings according to the most famous interpretation scholars

preview.html: Explaining all types of killing and its threat in a dream and its most important meanings by the most famous interpretation scholars. The Islamic religion prohibits murder because it is one of the crimes that works to disintegrate Islamic societies and spread corruption in them. The killer has a severe punishment in the end, and this is what is mentioned in many texts of the Holy Qur’an, and in the context of talking about murder, we will go to this article to explain the interpretation of murder, regardless of its type and error. Threats in a dream and their most important effects according to the most famous scholars of interpretation. The interpretation of seeing any type of killing in a dream: the methods of killing are varied, and all of these methods are forbidden in Islamic law, because they cause in a person’s soul and heart an intense fear for the society in which he lives, as indicated by the explanation of this dream, Citing: The interpretation of seeing murder in a dream, which came as follows: The interpretation of any kind of murder in a dream is evidence of the tension and intense fear that he suffers from in real life. In addition, if the dreamer sees in his dream a threat of death, this indicates A person who is planning and devising harmful measures against him. While the interpretation of seeing murder in a dream, and the killer is the father, indicates the intense sadness and anxiety that the dreamer will feel in his near future. See also: Interpretation of a dream about sexual intercourse for a divorced woman, one of the most famous interpretive scholars. Seeing any kind of murder in a dream for a woman Married women and their threats. This came after the fact that murder is one of the crimes forbidden by Islam, and it called on us to avoid it and not request it if a married woman feels astonished merely by seeing and acting upon seeing any type of murder and being threatened with it. A dream. If a married woman sees her husband killing her in her dream, this indicates the disputes and problems that will arise between them. This dream also indicates the husband’s betrayal of his wife. Also, seeing any kind of murder in a married woman’s dream indicates her separation from her husband. But if the woman sees If a married woman kills a man in a strange dream, this indicates that there is someone who wants to sabotage the relationship between her and her husband, but she will discover that person. See also: Interpretation of a dream about white mice in a dream by Ibn Sirin in detail. Interpretation of dreams about shooting with bullets and its most important indicators. Killing with bullets was one of the types of killing that Enemies use it to shed blood and get rid of people. This method is one of the most common methods of killing, and in the context of talking about it, we move from here to clarifying the interpretation of the dream of killing of all kinds, especially shooting in the following direction: The vision of shooting is one of the symbols that symbolizes the happiness and happy humanity that the dreamer will soon have. Seeing a pistol and a revolver are symbols that indicate wealth and a lot of money. In addition, shooting is a sign of joy and joy that the dreamer will enjoy in his near future. See also: Interpretation of a dream on Saturday in a dream and its meaning. Interpretation: I killed an old woman in a dream. Seeing an old man In a dream it is a symbol of evil and schemes that others are planning for you. This symbol is one of the dreams that indicates the evils that one fears

title: What is the interpretation of a dream about baldness by Ibn Sirin?

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about baldness: Seeing baldness in a dream has many connotations and meanings, some of which indicate goodness and some of which lead to evil and sadness. Interpretation scholars have clarified its meaning according to the condition of the dreamer and what was stated in the vision. We will show you the details related to the dream of baldness in a dream in the following article.Interpretation Dreaming of baldness in a dreamDreaming of baldness in a dream has many meanings and connotations, the most important of which are: If the dreamer sees baldness in his dream, this is a sign that he is bothering himself and straining his nerves for things whose time has not come in reality. Seeing baldness in a person’s dream means that he is looking at the future in a dark way. And pessimistic, as he does not think about anything good in his life. Baldness in a dream indicates that the person does not care about small problems and leaves them until they escalate and become complex and impossible to solve. If the person has long hair and is surprised that he is bald, this is an indication of the coming of a series of developments that will occur in his life. And he will work to change it radically in the near future. Interpretation of a dream about baldness by Ibn SirinThe scholar Ibn Sirin explained many meanings and associations associated with seeing baldness in a dream, the most important of which are: If the dreamer sees baldness in his dream, this vision expresses that he is exerting his utmost energy in achieving his goals, but he did not He achieves it. Ibn Sirin says that if a person sees in a dream that he has become bald, this is clear evidence that he will lose his beloved possessions in exchange for a certain thing. In the event that a man becomes bald in real life and sees in his dream that he is bald, there is an indication that a lot of good news and news Happy and happy occasions will enter his life in the coming period. If a person sees in his dream that he is suffering from partial baldness, this is an indication that he can overcome the crises that he faced in his life for only a short period. According to Ibn Sirin, if a man sees baldness in his dream, this is a sign of Loss of status and position in society. Interpretation of a dream of baldness by Imam Al-Sadiq. From the point of view of Imam Al-Sadiq, the dream of baldness carries within it many connotations, which are: If a person sees in his dream that he is bald in part of his head, this is a sign of his inability to achieve his goal due to the many obstacles that stands in his way. If a person is during the period of Hajj and sees in a dream that he is bald, then God Almighty will ease his affairs and restore his financial condition so that he can pay off the debt hanging around his neck. Baldness in a dream Imam Al-Sadiq’s interpretation of seeing a pregnant woman is unpleasant and indicates a heavy pregnancy and a difficult birth. And giving birth to a child whose body is weak and afflicted with diseases. Interpretation of a dream of baldness for a single woman. Baldness in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates that she suffers from psychological disorders that lead to a miserable life and bitter days. If the dreamer is a virgin and sees baldness in her dream, this is strong evidence of her weak and fragile personality and that she always desires Loneliness. If a girl who has never been married before sees that she is bald in her dream, this means that she is far from God and is not performing her religious duties to the fullest, which leads to depression. When seeing a separated girl whose hair has completely fallen out, this means

title: Interpretation of a dream about serving coffee to a deceased person in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about serving coffee to the deceased in a dream. Coffee is considered one of the ancient and modern drinks, and it is the main drink offered for hospitality on various occasions. It has various flavors and a delicious taste, and is accompanied by a refined mood for the connoisseur. But offering coffee to the dead in a dream is one of the strange and unusual visions that people have, so offering coffee to the deceased has a number of connotations and interpretations that differ depending on the person who sees it in the dream, and through this article we will learn about the interpretation of the dream of serving coffee to the deceased in a dream. Interpretation of a dream Offering coffee to the dead. Many people see different dreams during a dream and look for an interpretation of them in interpretation books so that they can understand them and realize their meaning. There have been several interpretations, some of which are presented here: Ibn Sirin says that if a person dreams that he is drinking a cup of coffee, this means that he is suffering. From many worries and problems in his life. And if he sees himself pouring a cup of coffee, this indicates that he is suffering from anxiety and confusion regarding some fateful decisions regarding which he is called upon to make his own decision. Sheikh Ibn Sirin believes that if a person dreams that he is drinking coffee mixed with saffron with a friend The dream indicates that the dreamer will benefit from his friend and reap a lot of money because of him. title: Interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream for a single woman

preview.html: We present to you the interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream for singles and what are its symbols in reality. The dream of a mountain is among the list of mysterious dreams that the dreamer does not know what this vision means to him. In fact, mountains are among the most beautiful natural landmarks created by God and prove the greatness of the Creator, and some of them may sometimes make you feel afraid of seeing the effect of their great height. On the other hand, in a dream, climbing a mountain may indicate to some dreamers that something good will happen to them, and descending from it may indicate something bad, but in the end there are many different interpretations of this dream depending on the situation. Which you can see through an encyclopedia in which we present to you the interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of the mountain. Interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream for a single woman Interpretation of seeing a mountain in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin provides several interpretations of this dream, the most important of which is that seeing a mountain in a dream symbolizes the hopes and aspirations of the dreamer who seeks to achieve it on the ground. Ibn Sirin mentioned that whoever sees in a dream that he is climbing mountains, this indicates the extent of his diligence in reality to achieve what he aspires to on the ground. Seeing a yellow mountain in a dream symbolizes the stability of the dreamer’s life. Whoever sees in a dream that he finds it difficult to climb a mountain, this vision generally indicates the difficult circumstances that the dreamer faces in reality. If the dreamer sees someone else he knows climbing the mountain, this vision indicates that this person will announce happy news to the dreamer, and God knows best. If a person is seen climbing a mountain with great ease in a patient’s dream, this indicates his recovery, and God knows best. Ibn Sirin interpreted that seeing a white mountain in a dream means goodness and happiness for the dreamer. Interpretation of a dream about a mountain in a dream for a single woman There are many different interpretations of this dream for a single woman, the most important of which are the following: If an unmarried woman sees in Her dream that she finds it difficult to climb a mountain, this dream shows the problems that she may face before marriage. Seeing a mountain in an unmarried woman's dream indicates the presence of a strong person in her family, it could be the father, brother or uncle. If an unmarried woman sees that she is climbing the top of a mountain, this vision bodes well because it may indicate that she will get married soon, God knows best. One of the symbols of seeing a mountain in an unmarried woman's dream is that it may indicate her marriage to a person who has great power and status in society. Seeing climbing a mountain in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates her marriage to a person of good morals, God knows best. Seeing an unmarried woman falling from a mountain in a dream means change and the beginning of a new life. It may indicate engagement or marriage if she is engaged, God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees a green mountain in her dream, this vision indicates that she will get married soon, God knows best, and the vision may indicate her success and excellence in reality. The difficulty of climbing a green mountain in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the difficulties and problems she faces in reality related to engagement or marriage, God knows best. These were the most prominent interpretations of seeing the

title: Interpretation of seeing face to face in a dream

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about seeing a prominent eye in a dream. A prominent eye is the appearance of an eye noticeably to others and it can be in both eyes or one eye. Seeing a prominent eye in a dream can indicate goodness, or it may be a warning or a warning against the appearance of evil. The eye either It was for a human being, a married woman, a pregnant woman, or a divorced woman, in its various meanings. Today, through the Roya website, we will discuss the interpretation of seeing out of sight in a dream in detail, based on the opinion of major interpreters such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Katheer, al-Nabulsi, or Imam al-Sadiq, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing an eye in a dream by Ibn Sirin. The dreamer’s vision is that his eyesight has weakened and his eyes cannot see. Clearly, this indicates feelings of anxiety, tension, and instability in his life. The dreamer’s weak vision shows his inability to make critical decisions in his life. The dreamer’s sharp vision indicates the strength of his personality and his ability to solve his affairs. Interpretation of seeing a blindfolded man. A man sees himself walking blindfolded or blindfolded. It indicates that The monarch puts himself to a severe test. Seeing a man in his eye in a dream indicates insight and spirit and does not symbolize the real eye. Seeing a man is an evil eye looking at him in a dream. This indicates that there are those who are trying to destroy him morally and materially, but he will defeat them. Interpretation of seeing the eye in a dream For a woman: Seeing an eye in a woman’s dream shows her children and religion. Seeing eye diseases in a dream indicates that she has harmed her children or her money. Seeing the eyes cleansed and treating diseases shows her upbringing. Seeing a woman with a glass eye shows that they are sensitive to emotions and feelings. For a woman to see her having an eye of silver or gold denotes her wealth, purity, and chastity. A woman saw that someone had put out her eye and it indicates evil that befell her son. Seeing a woman losing her sight declares her fascination with the magic of the world. Seeing many eyes in a woman’s dream mentions her many grandchildren. Interpretation of seeing many eyes in a dream. Seeing many eyes in a dream indicates the religious dreamer and the soundness of his religion. Seeing many eyes In the womb of the viewer. It indicates that the fortuneteller is an infidel and a heretic. Interpretation of seeing an eye made of wood or metal in a dream. Seeing wooden eyes in a dream: It symbolizes the viewer’s indifference to the words of others. Iron sight, which indicates the dreamer’s affliction with them and his distress, and reveals to him a secret. Seeing a glass eye in a dream, it indicates The fortuneteller defends the saints of others. Seeing the golden eye symbolizes the viewer’s self-sufficiency and lack of need for others. Silver sight means the seer’s asceticism in the world. A diamond visual sight indicates the viewer’s attachment to the world and the intensity of his love for it. The copper eye It indicates that the seer is practicing injustice and slander against others. Interpretation of eye colors in a dream. Seeing a black eye declares religion. Seeing a blue eye declares the dreamer a heresy. Seeing a pale eye in a dream says that he does not follow the teachings of religion. Seeing a green eye indicates that you follow a religion that is contrary to the religion of the dreamer. Interpretation of seeing the whites of the eyes in a dream. Seeing the whites of the eyes in a dream indicates a separation The person and the viewer are injured

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a divorced, single or married woman according to Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a divorced woman. The dreams that we see in our dreams vary. This vision brings to the dreamer different signs and signs. Great scholars have worked to interpret visions such as Ibn Sirin, Ibn Shaheen and other distinguished interpreters, as the translators interpret them. Many visions and dreams to know the best or worst of these visions, and the interpretation of period dreaming of blood is one of the dreams that many people see and has multiple interpretations. Seeing menstrual blood in a single woman’s dream. An unmarried girl sees many different visions and dreams in one dream, which indicate many Of signs and associations. Interpretation of a dream about seeing menstrual blood is one of the visions that has been interpreted in several ways, and among the most important signs that indicate seeing menstrual blood in a dream for an unmarried woman is any of the following signs: There are many different visions and dreams that one girl sees in a dream. And since seeing menstrual blood is for a girl Unmarried is one of those dreams, which indicates the anxiety and fear that an unmarried girl may be exposed to in the near future, but it will pass. In addition, seeing menstrual blood in a dream indicates the happiness that a woman feels after sadness. Also, seeing a single girl Having menstrual blood indicates the girl’s maturity from an emotional and spiritual standpoint. But when you see a dream of menstrual blood for an engaged girl, this means that her marriage will be completed with blessings and goodness, God willing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a girl in a dream for an unmarried woman according to Ibn Sirin and the most famous scholars of interpretation of seeing menstrual blood In a dream for a married woman, there are many different visions and dreams that we see in the dream, as these visions depend on different signs and signals in which they depend on the form and nature of the vision of the person who sees them, as one of the visions that have been achieved. It is interpreted in different ways, and one of the most important signs that indicates that seeing menstrual blood in a dream for a married woman carries any of the following several signs: There are many interpretations that scholars have worked on regarding seeing menstrual blood in a dream. When a married woman sees menstrual blood in a dream, this It indicates her happiness in married life. In addition, this vision shows the beautiful moments that this girl spends with her husband. Also, seeing menstrual blood in a dream indicates the ample and good livelihood that a married woman enjoys. In addition, it indicates an increase in status Direct financial support for a married woman and her family. As for seeing menstrual blood for a married woman who has not become pregnant, this indicates that she will become pregnant, God willing. See also: Interpretation of a dream that says “God is sufficient, and He is the best disposer of affairs” in the dream of a single woman and a married woman according to Ibn Sirin. title: Interpretation of a dream about shaking the walls of a house

preview.html: If the dreamer checks the condition of the house walls from shaking and is able to stop them in the dream, this indicates the sad things that he will get rid of, the problems that he will solve, or the passing of bad days. And welcome the good days for him, follow us to know more. Interpretation of seeing the walls shaking in a dream for a single girl If an unmarried woman dreams that she saw many of the walls of her house shaking in a dream and felt afraid. It shows the big problems that this single woman will face in her life. And seeing an unmarried girl in a dream that she is sitting in a house other than her house, and shaking it violently in a dream. It indicates that there are sad things that she will hear and learn about this time, and God knows best. And I saw in the dream of the unmarried dreamer that she is looking for something to support the walls of the house that are shaking in the dream. It indicates her constant search for a solution to a big problem she is going through. What if the unmarried woman was outside the house and saw it and its walls shook and she was about to fall in the dream. It indicates the bad things that will happen in the lives of people close to this person in her life. See also: Seeing the demolition of buildings in a dream Interpretation of seeing shaking walls in a dream for a married woman If a married woman sees in a dream that she is looking at the house shaking from a very close distance in the dream. It indicates her great need for money and livelihood at this time, And God is Most High and All-Knowing. And if a married woman sees that she is leaning on the shaking walls of the house in a dream. It shows a big problem that she will create in her married life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. And if a married woman tries to get rid of the shaking of the house in a dream. Here it indicates a big problem that this married woman will go through and get rid of, God willing. If the married woman who dreamed saw that the house was shaking violently and she was very afraid in the dream. It indicates some problems that will occur in her life, will destroy her life and make her sad. Interpretation of seeing the walls shaking in a dream for a divorced woman If a divorced woman sees in a dream that she is looking at the shaking walls in a dream, and she is very sorry about this matter. It indicates the bad things that this divorced woman will see in her life. Likewise, seeing a divorced woman in a dream that she is looking for something to support the shaking walls of her house. It indicates that he is looking forward to finding a solution to some of the problems he is currently facing. And the divorced woman who sits inside the house and watches a big earthquake inside it and its walls shake violently. It explains that there are issues and relationships that will be severed during this time of her life, and God knows best. And seeing A divorced woman sees her ex-husband in a dream, and he comes to her and sits with her in a house whose walls are shaking. It shows that there are no good things that this dreamer sees. Read also: Interpretation of dreams for construction Interpretation of seeing walls shaking in a man’s dream and its meaning If the dreamer sees in a dream that the walls of his own house are shaking violently. It indicates the bad things that he will see in the near future, God knows best. And seeing the dreamer in a dream looking for something to support his house and prevent it from shaking. This is a sign of something unhappy that will happen.
